Plot: A reporter returns to his Florida home-town to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.
Title: The Paperboy
Writer: Peter Dexter (screenplay), Lee Daniels (screenplay), Peter Dexter (based on the novel by)
Actors: Zac Efron, Matthew McConaughey, Nicole Kidman, John Cusack
tomatoConsensus: Trashy and melodramatic, The Paperboy is enlivened by a strong cast and a steamy, sordid plot, but it's uneven and often veers into camp.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 11 nominations.
